Estou à 5 anos a jogar este jogo,  cerca de 2376 horas, e nunca consegui chegar a Global. Perdi tudo o que tinha devido à compra compulsiva de chaves para abrir caixas, tudo o que me saiu ate ao momento foram apenas skins de 3 centimos e só ganho 1 centimo na venda das mesmas.

Düşük ranklar hilelerden geçilmiyo, yüksek ranklarda da az da olsa hile var.

Hands down my favorite PC FPS of all time. I've been playing Counter-Strike since it was introduced as a mod for Half-Life back in 1999 and it has only become better with each iteration since then. Although 1.3 might still be my favorite...

There are a @#$% load of maps and scenarios spread across a number of different game modes to play, and there's a ton of community made content. Valve also helps keep it fresh and new with Operation releases which happens at least once a year and provides new game content / objectives to complete for wicked rewards and lasts about 3 months.

There are a lot of other amazing FPS games out there, and I like playing them too. But Counter-Strike will always be my #1 favorite. If you haven't tried it yet, get on it! My StatTrak™ needs more souls.

Do me a favor, do it, do it.
